review.title: “One of the best atmospheres to work in.”
review.pros: Pros – Freedom and flow of information from one to another. Ideal interaction and no boss culture. Colleagues are very cooperative and senior management acts more as a elder friend, advising and keeping safe distant so as not to become personal. A very young team of professional the MD is 41yrs and have good vision of future.
review.cons: Cons – Small scale operation need to strike big now. Have to be more branched out at the moment concentrating more in western and eastern India. Should be a bit more creative with the website, and should be more representative in various exhibitions as well as shows.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Be more pro active have more marketing guys.... go out and rule the world.
